issue.title: SystemSetupDockerInstall should contain the docker installation step

content.raw:
Hi @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} , one doubt, I was reading the link “[#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim)”. Is there any difference between running cloudsim on local host vs running `osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:latest` docker image vs `ign launch tunnel_circuit_practice.ign ...`from a local Subt workspace?

Or all are equivalent?
content.html:
Hi @Alfredo Bencomo , one doubt, I was reading the link “#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim”. Is there any difference between running cloudsim on local host vs running osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:latest docker image vs ign launch tunnel_circuit_practice.ign ...from a local Subt workspace?

Or all are equivalent?
